member.name: T:ChatSharp.ChannelCollection
member.summary: A collection of IRC channels a user is present in.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.ChannelCollection.RemoveConditions(ChatSharp.IrcChannel)
member.summary: Remove all items from channels list

member.name: M:ChatSharp.ChannelCollection.Join(System.String)
member.summary: Join the specified channel. Only applicable for your own user.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.ChannelCollection.Contains(System.String)
member.summary: Returns true if the channel by the given name, including channel prefix (i.e. '#'), is in this collection.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.ChannelCollection.Contains(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns true if the channel by the given name exists, and user with the given nick has joined.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ChannelCollection.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the channel at the given index.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ChannelCollection.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the channel by the given channel name, including channel prefix (i.e. '#')

member.name: M:ChatSharp.ChannelCollection.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Gets an for the channels in this collection.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.ChannelCollection.System#Collections#IEnumerable#GetEnumerator
member.summary: Gets an for the channels in this collection.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.ClientSettings
member.summary: Customize the behavior of the ChatSharp client, including enabling or disabling "helper" features.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ClientSettings.WhoIsOnConnect
member.summary: If true, the client will WHOIS itself upon joining, which will populate the hostname in IrcClient.User. This will allow you, for example, to use IrcUser.Match(...) on yourself to see if you match any masks.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ClientSettings.ModeOnJoin
member.summary: If true, the client will MODE any channel it joins, populating IrcChannel.Mode. If false, IrcChannel.Mode will be null until the mode is explicitly requested.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ClientSettings.GenerateRandomNickIfRefused
member.summary: If true, the library will generate a random nick with alphanumerical characters if it encounters a NICK error.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ClientSettings.WhoIsOnJoin
member.summary: If true, the library will WHOIS everyone in a channel upon joining. This procedure can take several minutes on larger channels.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ClientSettings.JoinWhoIsDelay
member.summary: The delay, in seconds, between each WHOIS when WhoIsOnJoin is true.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.Events.ChannelTopicEventArgs
member.summary: Details of a channel topic event.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.ChannelTopicEventArgs.Channel
member.summary: The channel whose topic has changed.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.ChannelTopicEventArgs.Topic
member.summary: The new topic

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.ChannelTopicEventArgs.OldTopic
member.summary: The original topic.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.Events.ChannelEventArgs
member.summary: Generic event args for events regarding channels.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.ChannelEventArgs.Channel
member.summary: The channel this event regards.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.Events.ChannelTopicWhoTimeEventArgs
member.summary: Details of a channel topic who time event.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.ChannelTopicWhoTimeEventArgs.Channel
member.summary: The channel to which the user set the topic.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.ChannelTopicWhoTimeEventArgs.User
member.summary: User who last set the channel topic.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.ChannelTopicWhoTimeEventArgs.Time
member.summary: The time the user set the current channel topic.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.Events.ChannelUserEventArgs
member.summary: Generic event args for events regarding users in channels.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.ChannelUserEventArgs.Channel
member.summary: The channel this event regards.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.ChannelUserEventArgs.User
member.summary: The user this event regards.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.Events.ErrorEventArgs
member.summary: Raised when a Error occurs.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.ErrorEventArgs.Error
member.summary: The error that has occured.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.Events.ErrorReplyEventArgs
member.summary: Raised when a IRC Error reply occurs. See rfc1459 6.1 for details.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.ErrorReplyEventArgs.Message
member.summary: The IRC error reply that has occured.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.Events.HelpEventArgs
member.summary: Event describing an help.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.HelpEventArgs.Message
member.summary: The IRC message that describes this help reply.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.HelpEventArgs.Help
member.summary: The text of the help reply.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.Events.IrcNoticeEventCTCPArgs
member.summary: Event describing an IRC CTCP notice.

member.name: F:ChatSharp.Events.IrcNoticeEventCTCPArgs.Command
member.summary: CTCP command

member.name: F:ChatSharp.Events.IrcNoticeEventCTCPArgs.Reply
member.summary: CTCP reply

member.name: F:ChatSharp.Events.IrcNoticeEventCTCPArgs.Source
member.summary: The source of the CTCP notice.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.IrcNoticeEventCTCPArgs.Nick
member.summary: Nick of the source user

member.name: T:ChatSharp.Events.NickInUseEventArgs
member.summary: Describes an invalid nick event.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.NickInUseEventArgs.InvalidNick
member.summary: The nick that was not accepted by the server.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.NickInUseEventArgs.NewNick
member.summary: The nick ChatSharp intends to use instead.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.NickInUseEventArgs.DoNotHandle
member.summary: Set to true to instruct ChatSharp NOT to send a valid nick.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.Events.ErronousNickEventArgs
member.summary: Describes an invalid nick event.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.ErronousNickEventArgs.Command
member.summary: "431" ERR_NONICKNAMEGIVEN ":No nickname given" - Returned when a nickname parameter expected for a command and isn't found. or "432" ERR_ERRONEUSNICKNAME "nick :Erroneus nickname" - Returned after receiving a NICK message which contains characters which do not fall in the defined set. or "436" ERR_NICKCOLLISION "nick :Nickname collision KILL" - Returned by a server to a client when it detects a nickname collision (registered of a NICK that already exists by another server).

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.ErronousNickEventArgs.InvalidNick
member.summary: The nick that was not accepted by the server.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.ErronousNickEventArgs.Message
member.summary: Message from server.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.Events.IrcNoticeEventArgs
member.summary: Event describing an IRC notice.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.IrcNoticeEventArgs.Message
member.summary: The IRC message that describes this NOTICE.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.IrcNoticeEventArgs.Notice
member.summary: The text of the notice.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.IrcNoticeEventArgs.Source
member.summary: The source of the notice (often a user).

member.name: T:ChatSharp.Events.ListEventArgs
member.summary: Raised when a IRC server's 322 RPL_LIST "channel # visible :topic". See https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc1459#section-4.2.6

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.ListEventArgs.ListState
member.summary: The results of an IRC LIST query.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.Events.ListStartEventArgs
member.summary: Raised when a IRC server's 321 RPL_LISTSTART "Channel :Users Name" response to a LIST command. See https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc1459#section-4.2.6

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.ListStartEventArgs.Message
member.summary: The IRC server's 321 RPL_LISTSTART "Channel :Users Name" reply that has occured.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.Events.ModeChangeEventArgs
member.summary: Describes a change to a channel or user mode.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.ModeChangeEventArgs.Target
member.summary: The target of this change (a channel or user).

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.ModeChangeEventArgs.User
member.summary: The user who issued the change.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.ModeChangeEventArgs.Change
member.summary: The mode change string.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.ModeChangeEventArgs.Parameter
member.summary: Nickname who gives or takes the status of a channel such as o or v or Nickname/ hostmask which adds or removes a channel ban

member.name: T:ChatSharp.Events.MyInfoEventArgs
member.summary: Describes the RPL_MYINFO server reply.
member.remarks: See RFC2812 5.1 Command responses https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2812#section-5.1 for details

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.MyInfoEventArgs.MyInfo
member.summary: The My Info featureset.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.Events.PrivateMessageEventArgs
member.summary: Describes a private message we have received. The term "private message" is misleading - this describes both messages sent user-to-user, and messages sent to a channel.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.PrivateMessageEventArgs.IrcMessage
member.summary: The IRC message received.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.PrivateMessageEventArgs.PrivateMessage
member.summary: The private message received.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.Events.RawMessageEventArgs
member.summary: Describes a raw IRC message we have sent or received.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.RawMessageEventArgs.Message
member.summary: The text of the raw IRC message.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.RawMessageEventArgs.Outgoing
member.summary: True if this message is going from ChatSharp to the server.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.Events.ServerMOTDEventArgs
member.summary: Raised when we have received the MOTD from the server.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.ServerMOTDEventArgs.MOTD
member.summary: The message of the day.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.Events.SocketErrorEventArgs
member.summary: Raised when a SocketError occurs.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.SocketErrorEventArgs.SocketError
member.summary: The error that has occured.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.Events.SupportsEventArgs
member.summary: Describes the features the server supports.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.SupportsEventArgs.ServerInfo
member.summary: The server's supported featureset.

member.name: F:ChatSharp.Events.SupportsEventArgs.Message
member.summary:
RPL_BOUNCE RFC2812 :Try server <server_name>, port <port_number>
Sent by the server to a user to suggest an alternative server, sometimes used when the connection is refused because the server is already full. Also known as RPL_SLINE (AustHex), and RPL_REDIR.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.Events.UserListEventArgs
member.summary: Raised when a IRC server's 353 RPL_NAMREPLY "<channel> :[[@|+]<nick< [[@|+]<nick< [...]]]". NAMES message reply. https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc1459#section-4.2.5

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.UserListEventArgs.NamesState
member.summary: The results of an IRC NAMES 353 RPL_NAMREPLY reply.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.Events.WhoIsReceivedEventArgs
member.summary: Describes the response to a WHOIS query. Note that ChatSharp may generate WHOIS queries that the consumer did not ask for.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.WhoIsReceivedEventArgs.WhoIsResponse
member.summary: The WHOIS response from the server.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.Events.NickChangedEventArgs
member.summary: Raised when a user has changed their nick.

member.summary: The user whose nick changed.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.NickChangedEventArgs.OldNick
member.summary: The original nick.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.NickChangedEventArgs.NewNick
member.summary: The new nick.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.Events.UserEventArgs
member.summary: Generic event args that represent an event regarding a user.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.UserEventArgs.User
member.summary: The user this regards.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Events.UserEventArgs.Reason
member.summary: Reason for the end of the client session

member.name: T:ChatSharp.MaxNickLengthEventArgs
member.summary: Raised when nick's length is great of max nick length.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.MaxNickLengthEventArgs.MaxNickLength
member.summary: Max nick length.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.TopicEventArgs
member.summary: Raised when the topic of a channel has changed.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.TopicEventArgs.Message
member.summary: The IRC server's TOPIC reply that has occured.

summary.para: This is returned for a TOPIC request or when you JOIN, if the channel has a topic.
message.Parameters[2]: User who last set the channel topic.
message.Parameters[3]: The time the user set the current channel topic.

member.summary: IRC error replies handler. See rfc1459 6.1.

member.summary: IRC Error replies handler. See rfc1459 6.1.

member.summary: IRC fatal error handler.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.Handlers.ListHandlers
member.summary: IRC server's response to a LIST command. See https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc1459#section-4.2.6

member.summary: 321 RPL_LISTSTART "Channel :Users Name"

member.name: M:ChatSharp.Handlers.ListHandlers.HandleList(ChatSharp.IrcClient,ChatSharp.IrcMessage)
member.summary: 322 RPL_LIST "channel # visible :topic"

member.summary: 323 RPL_LISTEND ":End of /LIST"

member.summary: Exclude unhandled message event

member.name: M:ChatSharp.Handlers.UserHandlers.HandleWhoIsActually(ChatSharp.IrcClient,ChatSharp.IrcMessage)
member.summary: RPL_WHOISACTUALLY <source> 338 <target> <nick> <user>@<host> <ip> :Actual user@host, Actual IP

member.name: T:ChatSharp.IrcChannel
member.summary: An IRC channel.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.IrcChannel.Topic
member.summary: The channel topic. Will send a TOPIC command if set.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.IrcChannel.Name
member.summary: The name, including the prefix (i.e. #), of this channel.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.IrcChannel.Mode
member.summary: The channel mode. May be null if we have not received the mode yet.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.IrcChannel.Users
member.summary: The users in this channel.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.IrcChannel.UsersCount
member.summary: The users count in this channel. It is # visible parameter of the IRC server's reply 322 RPL_LIST "channel # visible :topic". See rfc1459#section-6.2 Command responses.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcChannel.#ctor(ChatSharp.IrcClient,ChatSharp.IrcMessage)
member.summary: Create channel from IRC server's reply 322 RPL_LIST "channel # visible :topic". See rfc1459#section-6.2 Command responses.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcChannel.Invite(System.String)
member.summary: Invites a user to this channel.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcChannel.Kick(System.String)
member.summary: Kicks a user from this channel.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcChannel.Kick(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Kicks a user from this channel, giving a reason for the kick.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcChannel.Part
member.summary: Parts this channel.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcChannel.Part(System.String)
member.summary: Parts this channel, giving a reason for your departure.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcChannel.SendMessage(System.String)
member.summary: Sends a PRIVMSG to this channel.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcChannel.ChangeMode(System.String)
member.summary: Set the channel mode.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.IrcClient
member.summary: An IRC client.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcClient.Nick(System.String)
member.summary: Send a NICK message. Changes your nick.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcClient.SendUser(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Send a USER message. Changes your realname and username.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcClient.SendMessage(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Sends a message to one or more destinations (channels or users).

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcClient.SendAction(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Sends a CTCP action (i.e. "* SirCmpwn waves hello") to one or more destinations.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcClient.SendNotice(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Sends a NOTICE to one or more destinations (channels or users).

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcClient.PartChannel(System.String)
member.summary: Leaves the specified channel.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcClient.PartChannel(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Leaves the specified channel, giving a reason for your departure.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcClient.JoinChannel(System.String)
member.summary: Joins the specified channel.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcClient.SetTopic(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the topic for the specified channel.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcClient.GetTopic(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the topic for the specified channel.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcClient.KickUser(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Kicks the specified user from the specified channel.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcClient.KickUser(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Kicks the specified user from the specified channel.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcClient.InviteUser(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Invites the specified user to the specified channel.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcClient.WhoIs(System.String)
member.summary: Sends a WHOIS query asking for information on the given nick.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcClient.WhoIs(System.String,System.Action{ChatSharp.WhoIs})
member.summary: Sends a WHOIS query asking for information on the given nick, and a callback to run when we have received the response.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcClient.WhoIs(ChatSharp.IrcUser,System.Action{ChatSharp.WhoIs})
member.summary: Sends a WHOIS query asking for information on the given user, and a callback to run when we have received the response.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcClient.GetMode(System.String)
member.summary: Requests the mode of a channel from the server.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcClient.GetMode(System.String,System.Action{ChatSharp.IrcChannel})
member.summary: Requests the mode of a channel from the server, and passes it to a callback later.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcClient.ChangeMode(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the mode of a target.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcClient.GetModeList(System.String,System.Char,System.Action{ChatSharp.MaskCollection})
member.summary: Gets a collection of masks from a channel by a mode. This can be used, for example, to get a list of bans.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcClient.List(System.Action{ChatSharp.ListState},System.String,System.String)
member.summary: List message. https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc1459#section-4.2.6
member.param: Called when a IRC server's 322 RPL_LIST <channel> # <visible> :<topic>" response to a LIST message.
Comma separated channels list. If the channels parameter is used, only the status of that channel is displayed.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcClient.NSIdentify(System.String)
member.summary:
NickServ Registering Nicknames.
pass: NickServ password

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcClient.Names(System.String,System.Action{ChatSharp.NamesState})
member.summary:
Names message.
channels: Comma separated channels list. If the channels parameter is used, specifies which channel(s) to return information about if valid.
callback: Called when a IRC server's 353 RPL_NAMREPLY "<channel> :[[@|+]<nick> [[@|+]<nick> [...]]]" response to a NAMES message.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcClient.Quit(System.String)
member.summary: Send a QUIT message with a reason, then disconnect.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.IrcClient.MessageHandler
member.summary: A raw IRC message handler.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcClient.SetHandler(System.String,ChatSharp.IrcClient.MessageHandler)
member.summary: Sets a custom handler for an IRC message. This applies to the low level IRC protocol, not for private messages.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.IrcClient.ServerHostname
member.summary: The address this client is connected to, or will connect to.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.IrcClient.ServerPort
member.summary: The port this client is connected to, or will connect to.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.IrcClient.ServerAddress
member.summary: The address this client is connected to, or will connect to. Setting this after the client is connected will not cause a reconnect.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.IrcClient.NetworkStream
member.summary: The low level TCP stream for this client.

member.name: F:ChatSharp.IrcClient.Message
member.summary: Message of socket disconnect

member.name: P:ChatSharp.IrcClient.UseSSL
member.summary: If true, SSL will be used to connect.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.IrcClient.IgnoreInvalidSSL
member.summary: If true, invalid SSL certificates are ignored.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.IrcClient.Encoding
member.summary: The character encoding to use for the connection. Defaults to UTF-8.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.IrcClient.User
member.summary: The user this client is logged in as.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.IrcClient.Channels
member.summary: The global channel collection of all channels we know about.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.IrcClient.Settings
member.summary: Settings that control the behavior of ChatSharp.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.IrcClient.ServerInfo
member.summary: Information about the server we are connected to. Servers may not send us this information, but it's required for ChatSharp to function, so by default this is a guess. Handle IrcClient.ServerInfoRecieved if you'd like to know when it's populated with real information.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.IrcClient.PrivmsgPrefix
member.summary: A string to prepend to all PRIVMSGs sent. Many IRC bots prefix their messages with \u200B, to indicate to other bots that you are a bot.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.IrcClient.Users
member.summary: A list of users on this network that we are aware of.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcClient.#ctor(System.String,ChatSharp.IrcUser,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new IRC client, but will not connect until ConnectAsync is called.
member.param: Server address including port in the form of "hostname:port".
The IRC user to connect as.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.IrcClient.timeoutConnectIRCServer
member.summary: The number of milliseconds to wait of connects the client to the specified IRC server

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcClient.isConnected
member.summary: Is IRC client connected to IRC server?
member.returns: true - IRC client is connected to IRC server

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcClient.ConnectAsync
member.summary: Connects to the IRC server.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcClient.Quit
member.summary: Send a QUIT message and disconnect.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcClient.Disconnect(ChatSharp.IrcMessage)
member.summary: Socket disconnect

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcClient.SendRawMessage(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Send a raw IRC message. Behaves like /quote in most IRC clients.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcClient.SendIrcMessage(ChatSharp.IrcMessage)
member.summary: Send a raw IRC message. Behaves like /quote in most IRC clients.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.ErrorReply
member.summary: IRC Error Replies. rfc1459 6.1.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.Disconnected
member.summary: Socket disconnected.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.Error
member.summary: Raised for errors.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.MessageError
member.summary: Raised for message errors.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.NetworkError
member.summary: Raised for socket errors. ChatSharp does not automatically reconnect.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.RawMessageSent
member.summary: Occurs when a raw message is sent.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.RawMessageRecieved
member.summary: Occurs when a raw message recieved.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.UnhandledMessageRecieved
member.summary: Occurs when an unhandled message received.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.NoticeRecieved
member.summary: Occurs when a notice recieved.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.NoticeRecievedCTCP
member.summary: Occurs when a CTCP notice recieved.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.HelpRecieved
member.summary: Occurs when a help recieved.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.MOTDPartRecieved
member.summary: Occurs when the server has sent us part of the MOTD.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.MOTDRecieved
member.summary: Occurs when the entire server MOTD has been recieved.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.PrivateMessageRecieved
member.summary: Occurs when a private message recieved. This can be a channel OR a user message.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.ChannelMessageRecieved
member.summary: Occurs when a message is recieved in an IRC channel.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.UserMessageRecieved
member.summary: Occurs when a message is recieved from a user.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.NickInUse
member.summary: Raised if the nick you've chosen is in use. By default, ChatSharp will pick a random nick to use instead. Set ErronousNickEventArgs.DoNotHandle to prevent this.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.ErronousNick
member.summary: Raised if the nick you've chosen is erronous.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.ModeChanged
member.summary: Occurs when a user or channel mode is changed.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.UserJoinedChannel
member.summary: Occurs when a user joins a channel.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.UserPartedChannel
member.summary: Occurs when a user parts a channel.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.ChannelListRecieved
member.summary: Occurs when we have received the list of users present in a channel.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.ChannelTopicReceived
member.summary: Occurs when we have received the topic of a channel.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.ChannelTopicWhoTimeReceived
member.summary: Occurs when we have received the topic of a channel or when you JOIN, if the channel has a topic.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.ConnectionComplete
member.summary: Occurs when the IRC connection is established and it is safe to begin interacting with the server.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.ServerInfoRecieved
member.summary: Occurs when we receive server info (such as max nick length).

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.MyInfoRecieved
member.summary: Occurs when we receive RPL_MYINFO server reply.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.UserKicked
member.summary: Occurs when a user is kicked.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.MaxNickLength
member.summary: Occurs when nick's length is great of max nick length ChatSharp.ServerInfo.MaxNickLength.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.Topic
member.summary: Occurs when a topic of a channel has changed.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.WhoIsReceived
member.summary: Occurs when a WHOIS response is received.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.NickChanged
member.summary: Occurs when a user has changed their nick.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.UserQuit
member.summary: Occurs when a user has quit.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.ListError
member.summary: Raised for add channel errors.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.ListStart
member.summary: IRC server's reply 321 RPL_LISTSTART "Channel :Users Name". rfc1459#section-4.2.6 Command responses.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.ListReply
member.summary: IRC server's reply 322 RPL_LIST "channel # visible :topic". rfc1459#section-4.2.6 Command responses.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.ListEnd
member.summary: IRC server's reply 323 RPL_LISTEND ":End of /LIST". rfc1459#section-4.2.6 Command responses.

member.name: E:ChatSharp.IrcClient.UserListReply
member.summary: IRC server's reply 353 RPL_NAMREPLY "<channel> :[[@|+]<nick< [[@|+]<nick< [...]]]". NAMES message reply. https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc1459#section-4.2.5

member.name: T:ChatSharp.IrcMessage
member.summary: Represents a raw IRC message. This is a low-level construct - PrivateMessage is used to represent messages sent from users.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.IrcMessage.RawMessage
member.summary: The unparsed message.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.IrcMessage.Prefix
member.summary: The message prefix.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.IrcMessage.Command
member.summary: The message command.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.IrcMessage.Parameters
member.summary: Additional parameters supplied with the message.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcMessage.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes and decodes an IRC message, given the raw message from the server.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.IrcProtocolException
member.summary: Raised when the server complains about IRC protocol errors.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.IrcUser
member.summary: A user connected to IRC.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcUser.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructs an IrcUser given a hostmask or nick.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcUser.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructs an IrcUser given a nick and user.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcUser.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructs an IRC user given a nick, user, and password.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcUser.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructs an IRC user given a nick, user, password, and real name.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcUser.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructs an IRC user given a nick, user, password, real name and Nickserv's password.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.IrcUser.Nick
member.summary: The user's nick.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.IrcUser.User
member.summary: The user's user (an IRC construct, a string that identifies your username).

member.name: P:ChatSharp.IrcUser.Password
member.summary: The user's password. Will not be set on anyone but your own user. See https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc1459#section-4.1.1

member.name: P:ChatSharp.IrcUser.NSPassword
member.summary: The user's password for identify in Nickserv. Will not be set on anyone but your own user. See http://wiki.foonetic.net/wiki/Nickserv_Commands

member.name: P:ChatSharp.IrcUser.Mode
member.summary: The user's mode.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.IrcUser.RealName
member.summary: The user's real name.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.IrcUser.Hostname
member.summary: The user's hostname.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.IrcUser.Channels
member.summary: Channels this user is present in. Note that this only includes channels you are also present in, even after a successful WHOIS.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.IrcUser.Modes
member.summary: The channel modes class.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.IrcUser.Modes.Mode
member.summary: Get user's channel mode.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.IrcUser.ChannelsModes
member.summary: The user's channel modes class.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcUser.ChannelsModes.Add(ChatSharp.IrcChannel,System.Nullable{System.Char})
member.summary: Add user's channel mode.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.IrcUser.ChannelModes
member.summary: The user's channel modes.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.IrcUser.Hostmask
member.summary: This user's hostmask (nick!user@host).

member.name: P:ChatSharp.IrcUser.WhoIs
member.summary: The results of an IRC WHOIS query. Depending on the capabilities of the server you're connected to, some of these fields may be null.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcUser.Match(System.String)
member.summary: Returns true if the user matches the given mask. Can be used to check if a ban applies to this user, for example.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcUser.Match(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the given hostmask matches the given mask.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcUser.Equals(ChatSharp.IrcUser)
member.summary: True if this user is equal to another (compares hostmasks).

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcUser.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: True if this user is equal to another (compares hostmasks).

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcUser.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns the hash code of the user's hostmask.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcUser.ToString
member.summary: Returns the user's hostmask.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.IrcUser.CTCP
member.summary: Client-to-client protocol
member.remarks: See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Client-to-client_protocol for details key: CTCP command of the reply value: CTCP reply

member.name: F:ChatSharp.IrcUser.CTCP.FirstAndLastCharacter
member.summary: First and last character of CTCP command and reply

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcUser.CTCP.Command(ChatSharp.IrcClient,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sends a private message with CTCP command to target user

member.name: M:ChatSharp.IrcUser.CTCP.NoticeRecieved(ChatSharp.IrcClient,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Occurs when a notice recieved.
member.param: The source of the notice. Example: "ChanServ!ChanServ@services."

member.name: F:ChatSharp.IrcUser.ctcp
member.summary: Client-to-client protocol

member.name: T:ChatSharp.ListState
member.summary: The results of an IRC LIST query. See https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc1459#section-4.2.6 for details

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ListState.Channel
member.summary: Channel, created from 322 RPL_LIST "channel # visible :topic" LIST message reply.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ListState.Message
member.summary: IRC server's 323 RPL_LISTEND ":End of /LIST" reply.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ListState.Channels
member.summary: Collection of all channels as reply of the LIST message. See https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc1459#section-4.2.6

member.name: M:ChatSharp.ListState.#ctor(ChatSharp.ChannelCollection)
member.summary: Constructor

member.name: M:ChatSharp.ListState.#ctor(ChatSharp.IrcMessage)
member.summary: Constructor

member.name: T:ChatSharp.Mask
member.summary: A mask that can be used to match against a user's hostmask in a channel list, such as banned users.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Mask.Creator
member.summary: The user who created this mask.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Mask.CreationTime
member.summary: The time this mask was added to the channel list.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.Mask.Value
member.summary: The mask string.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.MaskCollection
member.summary: A collection of masks from a channel list.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.MaskCollection.Add(ChatSharp.Mask)
member.summary: Adds a mask to the collection. This only modifies the local mask list, changes are not flushed to the server.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.MaskCollection.Remove(ChatSharp.Mask)
member.summary: Removes a mask from the collection. This only modifies the local mask list, changes are not flushed to the server.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.MaskCollection.Contains(ChatSharp.Mask)
member.summary: True if this collection includes the given mask.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.MaskCollection.ContainsMask(ChatSharp.Mask)
member.summary: True if this collection includes any masks that are equal to the given mask.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.MaskCollection.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the mask at the requested index.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.MaskCollection.ContainsMatch(ChatSharp.IrcUser)
member.summary: True if any mask matches the given user.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.MaskCollection.GetMatch(ChatSharp.IrcUser)
member.summary: Returns the mask that matches the given user.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.MaskCollection.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Enumerates over the masks in this collection.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.NamesState
member.summary: The results of an IRC NAMES query. See https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc1459#section-4.2.5 for details

member.name: P:ChatSharp.NamesState.User
member.summary: User, created from 353 RPL_NAMREPLY "<channel> :[[@|+]<nick> [[@|+]<nick> [...]]]" response to a NAMES message.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.NamesState.Channel
member.summary: Channel where user has added to.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.NamesState.Message
member.summary: IRC server's 366 RPL_ENDOFNAMES "<channel> :End of /NAMES list" reply.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.NamesState.Users
member.summary: A list of users on this network that we are aware of. Same as IrcClient.Users

member.name: M:ChatSharp.NamesState.#ctor(ChatSharp.UserPool)
member.summary: Constructor

member.name: T:ChatSharp.PrivateMessage
member.summary: Represents an IRC message sent from user-to-user or user-to-channel.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.PrivateMessage.User
member.summary: The user that sent this message.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.PrivateMessage.Message
member.summary: The message text.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.PrivateMessage.Source
member.summary: The source of the message (a nick or a channel name).

member.name: P:ChatSharp.PrivateMessage.IsChannelMessage
member.summary: True if this message was posted to a channel.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.ServerInfo
member.summary: Information provided by the server about its featureset.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.ServerInfo.GetModeForPrefix(System.Char)
member.summary: Gets the mode for a given channel user list prefix.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.ServerInfo.GetPrefixForMode(System.Nullable{System.Char})
member.summary: Gets the user list prefix for a given channel mode.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ServerInfo.IsGuess
member.summary: ChatSharp makes some assumptions about what the server supports in order to function properly. If it has not recieved a 005 message giving it accurate information, this value will be true.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ServerInfo.Prefixes
member.summary: Nick prefixes for special modes in channel user lists

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ServerInfo.ChannelTypes
member.summary: Supported channel prefixes (i.e. '#')

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ServerInfo.SupportedChannelModes
member.summary: Channel modes supported by this server

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ServerInfo.MaxModesPerCommand
member.summary: The maximum number of MODE changes possible with a single command

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ServerInfo.MaxChannelsPerUser
member.summary: The maximum number of channels a user may join

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ServerInfo.MaxNickLength
member.summary: Maximum length of user nicks on this server

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ServerInfo.ModeListLimits
member.summary: The limits imposed on list modes, such as +b

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ServerInfo.NetworkName
member.summary: The name of the network, as identified by the server

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ServerInfo.SupportsBanExceptions
member.summary: Set to ban exception character if this server supports ban exceptions

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ServerInfo.SupportsInviteExceptions
member.summary: Set to invite exception character if this server supports invite exceptions

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ServerInfo.MaxTopicLength
member.summary: Set to maximum topic length for this server

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ServerInfo.MaxKickCommentLength
member.summary: Set to the maximum length of a KICK comment

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ServerInfo.MaxChannelNameLength
member.summary: Set to the maximum length of a channel name

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ServerInfo.MaxAwayLength
member.summary: Set to the maximum length of an away message

member.name: T:ChatSharp.ServerInfo.MyInfo
member.summary: RPL_MYINFO server reply
member.remarks: See RFC2812 5.1 Command responses https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2812#section-5.1 for details

member.name: M:ChatSharp.ServerInfo.MyInfo.#ctor(ChatSharp.IrcMessage)
member.summary: Save of the RPL_MYINFO server reply

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ServerInfo.MyInfo.Servername
member.summary: Server name

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ServerInfo.MyInfo.Version
member.summary: version

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ServerInfo.MyInfo.AvailableUserModes
member.summary: Available user modes that affect either how the client is seen by others or what 'extra' messages the client is sent.
member.remarks: See RFC1459 4.2.3.2 User modes https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc1459#section-4.2.3.2 and RFC2812 3.1.5 User mode message https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2812#section-3.1.5 for more details

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ServerInfo.MyInfo.AvailableChannelModes
member.summary: Available channel modes that channel operators may change the characteristics of `their' channel. It is also required that servers be able to change channel modes so that channel operators may be created.
member.remarks: See RFC1459 4.2.3.1 Channel modes https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc1459#section-4.2.3.1 for details

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ServerInfo.myInfo
member.summary: RPL_MYINFO server reply

member.name: T:ChatSharp.ServerInfo.ChannelModes
member.summary: Modes a server supports that are applicable to channels.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ServerInfo.ChannelModes.ChannelLists
member.summary: Modes that are used for lists (i.e. bans).

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ServerInfo.ChannelModes.ChannelUserModes
member.summary: Modes that can be set on a user of a channel (i.e. ops, voice, etc).

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ServerInfo.ChannelModes.ParameterizedSettings
member.summary: Modes that take a parameter (i.e. +k).

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ServerInfo.ChannelModes.OptionallyParameterizedSettings
member.summary: Modes that take an optional parameter (i.e. +f).

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ServerInfo.ChannelModes.Settings
member.summary: Modes that change channel settings.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.ServerInfo.ModeListLimit
member.summary: Limits imposed on channel lists, such as the maximum bans per channel.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ServerInfo.ModeListLimit.Mode
member.summary: The mode character this applies to (i.e. 'b')

member.name: P:ChatSharp.ServerInfo.ModeListLimit.Maximum
member.summary: The maximum entries for this list.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.TopicTooLongException
member.summary: Raised when the topic is too long.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.TopicTooLongException.MaxTopicLength
member.summary: Set to maximum topic length for this server

member.name: T:ChatSharp.WhoIs
member.summary: The results of an IRC WHOIS query. Depending on the capabilities of the server you're connected to, some of these fields may be null.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.WhoIs.User
member.summary: A fully populated IrcUser, including hostname, real name, etc.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.WhoIs.Channels
member.summary: A list of channels this user is joined to. Depending on the IRC network you connect to, this may omit channels that you are not present in.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.WhoIs.IrcOp
member.summary: If true, the whois'd user is a network operator.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.WhoIs.RegNick
member.summary: If true, the whois'd user is using a registered nickname. See 307 RPL_WHOISREGNICK command response.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.WhoIs.NickTraces
member.summary: The user's nick traces.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.WhoIs.SecondsIdle
member.summary: Seconds since this user last interacted with IRC.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.WhoIs.Server
member.summary: The server this user is connected to.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.WhoIs.ServerInfo
member.summary: Additional information about the server this user is connected to.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.WhoIs.LoggedInAs
member.summary: The nickserv account this user is logged into, if applicable.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.WhoIs.Location
member.summary: Users location.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.WhoIs.error
member.summary: The error of an IRC WHOIS query. For example error = "401" ERR_NOSUCHNICK "nickname :No such nick/channel"

member.name: P:ChatSharp.WhoIs.Actually
member.summary: RPL_WHOISACTUALLY <source> 338 <target> <nick> <user>@<host> <ip> :Actual user@host, Actual IP
member.remarks: Use irc.efnet.org IRC server for testing

member.name: P:ChatSharp.WhoIs.Other
member.summary: A list of other WhoIs handlers
member.remarks: Example: :wilhelm.freenode.net 671 blink2 dvim :is using a secure connection

member.name: T:ChatSharp.KickEventArgs
member.summary: Raised when a user (possibly yourself) is kicked from a channel.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.KickEventArgs.Channel
member.summary: The channel the user was kicked from.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.KickEventArgs.Kicker
member.summary: The user who issued the kick.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.KickEventArgs.Kicked
member.summary: The user that was kicked.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.KickEventArgs.Reason
member.summary: The reason provided for the kick (may be null).

member.name: T:ChatSharp.UserPool
member.summary: A pool of users the client is aware of on the network. IrcUser objects in this pool are shared across the entire library (e.g. a PrivateMessage will reuse an IrcUser object from this poll).

member.name: P:ChatSharp.UserPool.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the IrcUser with the specified nick.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.UserPool.RemoveConditions(ChatSharp.IrcUser)
member.summary: Remove all items from users list

member.name: M:ChatSharp.UserPool.ContainsMask(System.String)
member.summary: Returns true if any user in the pool matches this mask. Note that not all users in the user pool will be fully populated, even if you set ClientSettings.WhoIsOnJoin to true (it takes time to whois everyone in your channels).

member.name: M:ChatSharp.UserPool.Contains(System.String)
member.summary: Returns true if any user in the pool has the specified nick.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.UserPool.Contains(ChatSharp.IrcUser)
member.summary: Returns true if the given IrcUser is in the pool.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.UserPool.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Enumerates over the users in this collection.

member.name: T:ChatSharp.UserPoolView
member.summary: A filtered view of the user pool.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.UserPoolView.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the IrcUser with the specified nick.

member.name: P:ChatSharp.UserPoolView.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the IrcUser with the specified index.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.UserPoolView.ContainsMask(System.String)
member.summary: Returns true if any user in the pool matches this mask. Note that not all users in the user pool will be fully populated, even if you set ClientSettings.WhoIsOnJoin to true (it takes time to whois everyone in your channels).

member.name: M:ChatSharp.UserPoolView.Contains(System.String)
member.summary: Returns true if any user in the pool has the specified nick.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.UserPoolView.Contains(ChatSharp.IrcUser)
member.summary: Returns true if the given IrcUser is in the pool.

member.name: M:ChatSharp.UserPoolView.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Enumerates over the users in this collection (with the filter applied).
